, the Packers are tied for second behind the Steelers in bringing down quarterbacks.`` Those guys fly around the ball and are always in good position,'' Michael Vick said of the Packers' defense. You just have to be ready for what they're going to do. They give you a lot of different looks and try to confuse you. Given the nature of the opposing defense and the porous nature of the Eagles' offensive line, this is not a good week for Michael Vick to be having issues with his all-important legs. Paul Domowitch

Klaus Schwab said he doesn't think it will.`` I'm absolutely sure that the euro will not collapse because I think there is still a strong European solidarity in place,'' he told AP. Europe, in this new world that is coming up, if it wants to become a key actor and stay a key actor it has to express itself in terms of its unity and it has to make sure that euro is also secured by a much greater common effort, working together in fiscal monetary and general economic policies. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.''
